A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am a 30-year fan who went in without expectations. This movie blew me away. It takes risks\, but they are great choices. The movie shakes up the mythology and rights some of the more repetitive plot points of its predecessor. It keeps you on your feet and kills a lot of the over used tropes of the franchise. That may be why some dislike it\, however\, it really is not worth the hate. It's a stellar movie with amazing performances all around. A brilliant addition to the saga. Well done\, Rian Johnson!
